title: Fuse Two Champs together to create the ultimate champion..
body:
{{champion:45}} {{champion:203}} 

P: Grants permanent stacks for landing abilities, each stack adds +1% Max HP Damage to Auto Attacks
Q: Hops and fires a single projectile and nearest enemy (Champions prioritized)
W: Creates an area for 5 seconds where wolves rain down each second in random spots each doing damage
E: Slows target champion, upon 3 stacks target champion is dealt additional damage
R: Creates a ring, all things in the ring have their health preserved at a minimum 10% however enemy champs still in the ring after 5 seconds are stunned for 1 second.

EDIT:

Wow. 13 Comments in a day, zero upvotes. Must be a really average game I've created xD

I (o)LafJhin out loud right now at that pun.
I used to joke that if Darius and Fiora had a love child it would have a god ult.....Untargetable life stealing true damage sword and axe combo dunk.

teemo/blitzcrank

p: stealth after not moving and gets a shield after coming out of stealth.
q: rocket grab with a silence
w: super speed boost
e: autos really hurt and knock up enemies (cant knock up the same enemy multiple after a short period)
r: shrooms silence and have sunfire cape aoe damage on them if untriggered

{{champion:267}} {{champion:16}} 

Passive: gain 40% movement speed towards allies below 40% HP, and grant all allied units hit by your abilities 60+20% AP bonus movement speed for 1 second, (These bonuses are doubled for those hit by your ultimate)
Q: Call down a bubble from the stars stunning all enemies hit and granting you Rejuvination
W: On Enemy cast, deal minor damage then bounces towards a nearby enemy healing them for a large amount, that then bounces to a nearby enemy (different from the first) dealing reduced damage. On Ally Cast, heal for a massive amount, bounce to enemy dealing minor damage, then bounce back to a new ally healing for less than the first, but still a significant amount. If You are affected by Rejuvination when you cast this ability, your ally gains Rejuvination for X seconds, and enemies take an additional DoT equal to Rejuvination.
E: Silence all enemies in the area, and grant allies a slow on hit buff, enemies still in the area when the silence field expires are snared.
R: Send a wave that rushes forward, healing allies and knocking up foes that are hit. Enemies are also slowed when they land. Heal on allies is increased by 50% when allies are below 40% HP.
I would go so far as to make the ult still global; have it become an infinite circular wave

{{champion:11}} {{champion:12}} 

Q: Alpha-strike knocks up every affected enemy unit
W: Meditate knocks away all surrounding enemies
R: Attack Damage, Movement Speed and Attack Speed Steroid which provides slow immunity and damage reduction, extending on kill or assist

Q, W and R are extremely powerful.  The passive and E don't really warrant mention in comparison.

{{champion:1}} {{champion:101}} 

Passive: Each time Annerath autoattacks a unit, she gains a stack. Upon reaching 2 stacks, her next basic attack or ability restores 150(x level) amount of mana and stuns the target.

Q: Annerath charges for a maximum of 4 seconds. Upon reaching the max time or releasing the button before 4 seconds she will fire a blue/red beam of energy in a direction.

W: Annerath releases arcane energy in front of her in a wide long range cone, pulling all hit enemies toward her if she casts the spell again in the next 3 seconds.

E: Annerath takes 85% reduced damage and releases a giant sphere going through units in a straight line. Upon reaching it's set length, it detonates and will stun all enemies it either passes through or hit.

R: Annerath summons 3 different bears made of pure arcane energy all at once, they will do damage in a large AOE around where they were summoned, and will all attack the enemy Annerath chooses. This is global. She gains +70% movement speed after using this.

BEAR 1: Occasionally roars, shooting an undodgable blast of fire that stuns enemies on impact.
BEAR 2: Has increased attack speed and movement speed, and will slow all enemies it hits by 60%.
BEAR 3: Will pick up targets it comes in contact with (like Skarner) and apply a damage over time effect on them.
